name: The Chronicles of Medrash
short_description: This digital game was produced as part of the evaluation criteria for the "Introduction to Digital Game Design" course offered by School of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Campinas, Brazil. This course was taught by Prof. José Mario De Martino, Ph.D in first half of 2012. The game is a freeware for non-commercial use. All resources used and not created by authors were appropriately referenced in the game's acknowledgments section. It is an unofficial publication of the University of Campinas, its contents have not been examinated or edited by this institution. The responsability for its contents remains exclusively with the authors. The authors (in alphabetical order) are Abel Soares Siqueira, Edgar Armeliato, Fernanda de Aguiar Leal, Harlei Miguel de Arruda Leite, Julián Mauricio Prada Sanmiguel, Paúl Hernán Mejía Campoverde, Rodrigo Aparecido Morbach, Rodrigo Mologni Gonçalves dos Santos, Thiago Cavalcante, and Tiago Cinto.
summary: The Chronicles of Medrash: the Invasion of the Luskan Warriors
